com.mapzen.android.graphics.model

Class MarkerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.android.graphics.model.MarkerOptions
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class MarkerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines options for a BitmapMarker. This class has been deprecated in favor of BitmapMarkerOptions which replaces this class' behavior exactly.

      • icon

        public MarkerOptions icon(int resId)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the marker icon resource ID. Setting this property will override previously set resource ids set in the call to icon(Drawable).
        Parameters:
        resId - drawable resource ID for the marker to display.
        Returns:
        this marker options instance.
